Great concept. Nice maps and environmental interaction.

i love the base idea, i love the base design. I want to love the game but ... balance is utterly lacking and the worst part of this in is the maps... some of them have ungodly bad hit boxes on objects, often a foot or two from were the things edge displays. causing on some maps spots were a survivor can just walk between things but the killer cant', even though it LOOKS like they should fit right on through. Trolling a killer is just promoted by the game balance with the designs of perks and items at this point. Connection stability is beyond questionable most of the time. Often leaving one on either side of a strike asking "how did that hit, or how did that miss?"

You can really enjoy the game, but it needs a lot of practice and a bit of grind.

What made it for me - the feel of playing the killer)

great game fun with friends and always something to work towards. after while it does become annoying in high MMR because you will get very sweaty games, but overall its a great game

Physical warm-up at the level, squatted, ran a few laps, nodded his head-great, thank you!

Is a nice game if everyone plays nicely, but we are humans and rebellous (and make mistakes) so sometimes shitty games happen...otherwise its playable casually.

I do LOVE the custom games part, when its a full team with friends, its laugh and fun guaranteed.

Please don't take this game seriously, especially the results of every game. 

Enjoy the fun!

I recommend. However, take the community with a grain of salt. I have met some fantastic people through the game but also some real tools. It's a game. You're fine. Co-op and get out. Or have a fun murder time if Killer is more your style. Just don't be a jerk about it. It's not Camping Season.

By far one of the most satisfying games to play today as the game play still seems new and fresh.

In a word of MOBAs and PUBG like games its refreshing to find a game that has a side that is single player like (killer) and one that is co-op perfectly enjoyed with friends.

Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€ĞµÑĞ½Ğ°Ñ, Ğ° ĞµÑĞ»Ğ¸ ÑĞ²ĞµÑ‚ Ğ²Ñ‹ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ‚Ğ¾ ĞµÑ‰Ğµ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ½Ğ°Ñ.
make sure to run away from the killer

The game can be either really fun or really infuriating. Despite the multiple issues that are in this game, it's community is rather strong. Dead by Daylight has a reputation of having a toxic community but it's not as bad as you think. New content is fairly frequent so the game maintains some freshness to it. If you like to play alone than killer is something you'll lean into but you can still enjoy survivor for the most part. With friends playing survivor is pretty fun and more optimal. I do caution that if plan to get into the game and play a ton of it, you should buy the game during a sale as licensed content really adds up to the cost of the game. Grinding for non licensed stuff takes a very long time but you can still get it for free. I hope this review shed some light on the game. See you in the fog!

I got this on the sale  for about six quid, and it's an ok sort of horror runaround. As a Horror fan i expected it to be a lot scarier, but it's not bad. I was a little disappointed that you HAVE to buy 'cells' from the store to use as currency to customize your characters. Why not just use 'Bloodpoints'?
I love the backstories of the characters and things. It reminds me of Twisted Metal. Similar 'rusted' style too.
